/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is teeming with life, lined with a variety of buildings and trees that add a touch of green to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are seen in motion, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is captured from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting beautifully with the green of the trees and the various hues of the buildings. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, making the viewer feel as if they are standing at the edge of the frame, looking down at the busy street below.
